txt.en: This looks to be a wholesome, fertile sort of place....
It is not a bad idea to gather food and water while you can, for the thought of being lost in the woods without such necessities is a gruesome one.
It is not a bad idea to gather food and water while you can, for the thought of being lost in the woods without such necessities is a gruesome one.
It is not a bad idea to gather food and water while you can, for the thought of being lost in the woods without such necessities is a gruesome one.
You have collected ample water and food, should it come in handy while in this wild place. It may be long before you look upon another market-vendor.

Turnips and fresh water can be found along the Entwash River in the Hale-gap.\n\nYou should collect fresh water and edible plants while they are still available, for you do believe these necessities will not be readily found within Fangorn.
You have collected ample water and food, should it come in handy while in this wild place. It may be long before you look upon another market-vendor.
